JSRDotNETSDK Reference

IJSRDotNET Methods

IJSRDotNET Interface  See Also

The following tables list the members exposed by the IJSRDotNET type.

Methods
Name Description
Configure Configures the plugin
GetEarliestLogLine Gets earliest log line.
GetLogLineCount Gets log line count.
GetPulserReceiver Given a pulser receiver id, this returns a reference to a pulser receiver object.
GetPulserReceivers (Overloaded) Gets an array of pulser receiver Ids that are within the specified instrument. Alternatively, there is an overload of this method which takes the model number an serial number string as arguments instead of this instrumend identity object. Normally, the application will get the instrument ID object from the InstrumentDiscoveredEvent handler.
Reset Resets this module so it can be reconfigured. The Open Options should be set again after calling this function and Discovery can be re-enabled. Not all plugins support this feature, so check the return code from this function to determine if the plugin instance can be re-used.
Shutdown Shuts down this module by stopping any threads and freeing any resources it is using. This must be done before the application exits to avoid hangs at exit time.
Top
See Also
